name: 女巫与六便士 the sibyl and sixpence
name_original: 女巫与六便士 the sibyl and sixpence
description:
It's a 15-minute experimental visual novel about a love affair as weak as tea.
Story consists of two chapters, formed by a mixture of four clues.
It tells a love story about the sibyl and the prince.

“You know, it was not easy to write such a story. ”
“It seemed like taking every last bit of my sixpences from my piggy bank.”
“The thing is, all the piggy banks needs to be smashed into pieces,”
“before you took the coins out.”

Steam Platform's "the Sibyl and Sixpence" is more used for the collection of players, and all the revenue generated from PC sales will be devoted to the development of "Falsemen3".
If you don't like the story, you can send a bad review in the Steam comments section and submit a refund application to the customer service.
If you want to refund this work, but Steam customer service does not agree, you can send your purchase screenshot to my personal mailbox, I will refund you the first time after receiving the mail.
